definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Never had such an honor been accorded to any other Russian composer.
sentences.chinese: 從來沒有一個俄國作曲家得到過這樣的榮譽。

sentences.english: Theory, Aural, Technique, Song Writting, Improvisation Ideas.
sentences.chinese: 樂理，聽力，技術，作曲，即興。

sentences.english: And a member of the Borodin belonged to one of the most talented composers.
sentences.chinese: 而成員之一的鮑羅丁屬於最具天賦的一位作曲家。

sentences.english: Toru Takemitsu is one of Asia's celebrated composers of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 武滿徹是20世紀亞洲最富盛名的作曲家之一。

sentences.english: He's a composer of serious music. I like his music a lot.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位嚴肅音樂作曲家，我非常喜歡他的音樂。

sentences.english: Recently I've worked with a few great Chinese composers.
sentences.chinese: 我最近正在和一些傑出的中國作曲家合作。

sentences.english: He is currently the Head of Composition and Electronic Music at the Hong Kong Academy of Performing Arts.
sentences.chinese: 目前是在香港演藝學院作曲及電子音樂的骨幹成員。

sentences.english: Barney:But, even We did right the word, Fred, We don't know about writing the music.
sentences.chinese: 可是，就算我們會寫詞，我們也不會作曲啊。

sentences.english: Songs by Cheng law into their songs, Moyer composition.
sentences.chinese: 歌曲由鄭律成作詞，莫耶作曲。

sentences.english: My uncle, an accountant, composes music as an avocation.
sentences.chinese: 我叔叔是一位會計師，作曲是他的業餘愛好。

sentences.english: She is not only a singer but also a great composer herself.
sentences.chinese: 她不只是一位歌手，而且還是一名優秀的作曲家呢。

sentences.english: Liu Jian, Composer, Professor from Wuhan Conservatory of Music.
sentences.chinese: 劉健，作曲家，武漢音樂學院作曲系教授。

sentences.english: Liu Jian, Composer, Professor from Wuhan Conservatory of Music.

sentences.english: Mr. Zhang and Mr. Tan, the composer, said they wanted to keep things simple.
sentences.chinese: 張軍，還有作曲家譚盾，說他們想一切從簡。

sentences.english: The composer set a sonnet to music.
sentences.chinese: 作曲家爲一首十四行詩譜了曲。

sentences.english: How might algorithmic composition technology change the face of music?
sentences.chinese: 算法作曲的出現將會如何改變音樂的面貌呢？
